narrative: Added dynamic data fetching for trend and MFI visualization in the React frontend. Updated the Python MFI plot to request data from the new FastAPI server, falling back to placeholder data. Documented watchers instructions earlier so devs know how to handle ENOSPC errors. This prepares the project to visualize live patterns from the backend and align with upcoming agentic integrations.
scene: Developers can now launch the FastAPI server and Vite frontend to see dynamic trend diagrams fetched from the backend. The Python script can visualize the same data for analysis.
